Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1022 Excavations

1022.01Permit required. 1022.02Permit application; issuance; deposit. 1022.03Opening and restoration of pavement. 1022.04Barricades required. 1022.05Warning lights required. 1022.06Failure to remove earth material deposited. 1022.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Openings by municipality - see Ohio R.C. 723.02

Excavation liability - see Ohio R.C. 723.49 et seq.

Barricades and warning lights - see GEN. OFF. 660.09

Mining - see P. & Z. 1270.33 et seq.

Protection of trees at excavation sites - see P. & Z. 1282.11
